32 2016年的片尾滚动字幕

2017-01-22 | 阅读：次

以我们一贯的催眠风格，作2016年最后的滚动字幕。

本期节目录制于20161231/20170122，主播：小猪 深思 CrazyEMH

————

05:47 星联英语补习班

  • Structural integrity 结构完整性/度
  • Integral 积分

10:27 星舰学院入学考场

  • The Needs of the Many Outweigh the Needs of the Few 是否会发展为多数人的暴政（Tyranny of the majority）？
  • Nichelle Nichols 的生日

17:51 7 January - Richard Libertini dies. DS9 " Accession" 中扮演 Akorem Laan

20:12 20 January - B airbre Dowling dies. Colm Meaney（O'brien）之前妻

21:10 15 February - Anthony Fredrickson dies. Scenic and graphic artist

22:30 Michael Okuda在星际迷航官方播客"Engage: The Official Star Trek Podcast"中最近接受过采访。

22:50 16 February - Leonard: My Fifty-Year Friendship with a Remarkable Man, by William Shatner, is released.

23:31 28 February - Lee Reherman dies. Star Trek Into Darkness 中扮演a Section 31 operative

24:09 3 March - Gary Hutzel dies. TNG前5季与整个DS9中的视效艺术家

24:22 10 March - Ken Adam dies. Enterprise, shuttlecraft、以及未完成的Star Trek: Planet of the Titans的设计师

24:54 15 March - Roma Lee Tracy dies. 背景角色

25:52 扩展阅读：Weirdest and Sexiest Costumes from the Original Star Trek( 原初的那些奇装异服)

26:20 17 March - Larry Drake dies. VOY " Critical Care" 中扮演 Administrator Chellick

27:13 4 April - The Ultimate Star Trek and Philosophy is released.

29:22 17 April - Scott Nimerfro dies. Writer and producer who co-wrote the VOY " Jetrel". the associate producer in 1997 Star Trek documentary, Trekkies.

29:58 8 May - William Schallert dies. TOS " The Trouble with Tribbles"与DS9 " Trials and Tribble-ations"中扮演 Nilz Baris，在DS9" Sanctuary"中还演过 Varani

31:38 26 May - Angela Paton dies.在VOY第一集" Caretaker" 中 扮演 Aunt Adah

32:55 26 May - Star Trek: The Starfleet Academy Experience opens at the Canada Aviation and Space Museum in Ottawa, Ontario.

33:41 31 May - Trekonomics: The Economics of Star Trek is released.

34:52 1 June - David Spielberg dies. TNG" Starship Mine"中扮演 Commander Calvin Hutchinson

35:54 4 June - Rico Bueno dies. DS9与VOY中的背景演员

36:48 7 June - Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan 蓝光导演剪辑版

36:59 National Geographic出版 Star Trek: The Official Guide to Our Universe

38:42 The Star Trek Book - Strange New Worlds Boldly Explained by Paul Ruditis出版

39:03 14 June - Ronnie Claire Edwards dies. 扮演Data失忆时给与帮助的一个Barkonian科学家Talur

40:59 19 June - Anton Yelchin dies. Chekov的Ensign Authorization Code是95VV2。字母V在国际民航组织（ICAO）规定的英语陆空通话标准用语里读法为Victor。 Anton Yelchin父亲名字Viktor Yelchin。 可能 是致敬吧。

45:06 30 October - Don Marshall dies. 在TOS" The Galileo Seven"中演 Lt. Boma，另外他在Gene Roddenberry创作的另一部电视剧_"Lieutenant" 的一集_To Set It Right 中扮演Nichelle Nichols（Uhura扮演者）的角色的未婚夫。

47:46 21 November - Ron Thornton dies. 视效师，视效公司 Foundation Imaging 创始人，因VOY " Timeless"一集获得艾美奖提名，该公司参与的星际迷航制作有Star Trek: The Motion Picture、DS9、VOY、ENT

49:32 26 November - Fritz Weaver dies. DS9 " Tribunal" 中扮演O'brien的发言人和律师 Kovat

51:13 JOHN GLENN，第一个进入地球轨道的太空人( July 18, 1921 – December 8, 2016)

54:54 12 July - Seamon Glass dies. Benton in " Mudd's Women"

55:13 《 Redshirt's Little Book of Doom》和《 Hidden Universe Travel Guide: Vulcan》出版

55:58 2 2 July - Star Trek Beyond 北美上映

56:03 29 July - The Star Trek Beyond soundtrack is released

56:09 2 August - David Huddleston 在" Emergence" TNG 7x23中饰演全息甲板里的列车长

56:46 9 August - Barry Jenner dies. playing DS9 Admiral William Ross

57:55 1 November -

  • Star Trek Beyond蓝光碟发布
  • Building Star Trek纪录片发布，b站无字幕版av6196535
  • 50 Years of Star Trek纪录片发布，b站无字幕版av5840482

58:19 15 November - Star Trek: The Animated Series on Blu-ray is released.

58:29 25 November - Ron Glass dies. "Nightingale" 中 Loken 扮演者

58:55 29 November - Brian Demonbreun dies. 建筑可视化艺术家以及 DS9、TNG 共50多集背景演员

59:41 6 December - For the Love of Spock, from Adam Nimoy, is released.

1:00:02 12 December - Star Trek Beyond: The Deluxe Edition is released by Varèse Sarabande Records.

1:00:10 13 December - Star Trek: The Original Series - The Roddenberry Vault on Blu-ray is released.

1:00:34 20 December -

  • Star Trek: The Original Series Adult Coloring Book from Dark Horse is released.
  • Star Trek: The Next Generation Adult Coloring Book from Dark Horse is released.

1:01:07 27 December - Barbara Tarbuck dies. 在TNG 4x23 " The Host"中扮演 Governor Leka Trion，后又在ENT 第一季" Shadows of P'Jem"中扮演 Kalev

JOHN GLENN: For many, many thousands of years, people had looked up and wondered. They'd been curious about what was up there. Now, we must consider ourselves among the most fortunate of all generations, for we have lived at a time when the dream became a reality.
